extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites    CLST303 or CLST304 or CLST305 or CLST306 and second year standing

basic.description: An intensive six-week introduction to archaeological methods and interpretation at a fieldwork project in Italy under the supervision of a member of the Classics Department. In addition to tuition, students are expected to pay their own travel and accommodation costs.
basic.subject: CLST
basic.title: Archaeology Fieldwork Practicum II
